title: Post #1 Welcome
text:
Welcome to my personal blog!



courtesy to Microsoft Designer


I thought it would be useful to start with an AI-generated image so here it is (looks familiar?). In this blog, I’m going to write mostly about the stuff related to AI, computer science, and agile, or… well, everything that I find either useful, interesting, or enjoyable.
And as the late Terry Pratchett wrote in one of his books:

It doesn’t stop being magic just because you know how it works.

title: About
text:
Hello there!
I’m a Data Scientist and Agile Coach currently working at Novartis Biomedical Research with a passion for using AI in my daily work. I take a data-driven approach, focusing on delivering innovative solutions with real-world impact. My expertise includes:

AI & Machine Learning: Deep learning, explainable AI, and building production-ready ML models.
Team & Tech Leadership: Fostering team growth and driving digital transformation.
Pharmaceutical Industry: Deep understanding of the drug development pipeline, from research to market.

Previously, I’ve worked at Roche tackling challenges across the entire drug development process.

Open Source Advocate
I believe in the power of collaboration and knowledge sharing. I’m actively involved in the open-source community, contributing to make research tools more accessible and empower scientists worldwide.
